messages.title: Voting Conservative here could let these people in...
messages.content: You can only stop Labour winning here by voting Lib Dem

images.caption: Voting Conservative here could let these people in... Ed Miliband - Prime Minister? Ed Balls - Chancellor? Alex Salmond - Deputy Prime Minister? Labour's candidate - your MP? You can only stop Labour winning here by voting Lib Dem
